cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ c2)
⊣ c1 =(Atoms ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

comment: An atom is a member of the lattice base set (i.e. a lattice element). ( ~ atelch analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2011.)
